narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Rayim of Hudson Valley Inc. is a Early Intervention Provider Agency provider based in Monroe, NY. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $81.5M in Medicaid payments across 221K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $81.5M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
